title: Beautiful 5-bedroom Luxury Home with Designer Upgrades & Strip Views
map_address: Eastern Ave near W Horizon Ridge Pkwy
posting_body: Highly upgraded 5-bedroom house for rent just 2 mins.
from GV Ranch Resort & The District.
Right in the heart of Green Valley, close to shopping, restaurants and zoned for all top-rated schools (Del Webb & Coronado).
5 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms and a 3-car garage.
Great floorplan with large family room featuring a wet bar.
Formal living room and dining room featuring 18" travertine tile floors.
Designer chefs kitchen with glass front cabinetry, custom counters, pantry, recessed lighting and all appliances.
Huge master suite with sitting room and private balcony offering city and Strip views.
Good size secondary bedrooms with shared bathroom.
A true backyard oasis with lush desert landscaping, covered patio and a built-in BBQ bar.
Looking for 1-year lease.
TENANT OCCUPIED - AVAILABLE 8/30
Rent: $2,950/month
Security dep: $3,200
Pet deposit: $500
App.fee: $75/applicant   (Owners request solid references and good credit)
